DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate difference digestion rate stomach problem cause pasteurized homogenize milk compare raw milk healthy adult ingestible capsule measure pH pressure , diary symptom , blood glucose triacylglycerol level plasma cytokine level .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Homogenization Pasteurization Milk Stomach Problems Adults
DOC.criteria: Homogenized pasteurized milk cause stomach problem ( selfreported ) unhomogenized unpasteurized milk cause stomach problem ( selfreported ) age 1865 BMI 18,5 30 hemoglobin normal range fast plasma alanine aminotransferase ALAT < 60 U/l ( normal liver function ) fast plasma thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) 0.4 4.5 mU/l ( normal thyroid function ) fast plasma creatinine < 118 umol/l ( normal kidney function ) pace maker Crohn 's disease disease intestinal tract intestinal operation within last 3 month difficult dysphagia smoking constipation
